message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $15000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and lifetime support. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $15000 is a bit higher than my budget. Given the product's value to me is around $12000, I'm willing to pay $12500. This would be a fair price for both of us.
